Class AStarAss1

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • AStarAss1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, SolverListener

    public class AStarAss1
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements SolverListener
    Main class that reads a board from a text file and calls the A* algorithm to find a path for all smileys.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • GUI

        private static final boolean GUI
        Defines if we want a GUI representation of the solutions. If set to false, the program will simply return the solutions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUG

        private static final boolean DEBUG
        Set to true if you want to see the value of every calls of the heuristic function
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CENTER_COORDINATES_ON_HOME

        private static final boolean CENTER_COORDINATES_ON_HOME
        Centers the coordinates around home. That would mean the home has coordinates of (0,0) and the top-left cell has coordinates of (-width/2, height/2).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DELAY

        private static final int DELAY
        Specifies the delay between each move for the GUI representation of the solutions, in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • textArea

        private javax.swing.JTextArea textArea

      • board

        private Board board
